meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the use of a stereomicroscope.
meanings.sent1: She observed the tiny organism stereomicroscopically, carefully adjusting the lens for a clearer view.
meanings.sent2: The scientist examined the specimen stereomicroscopically to study its intricate details.
meanings.sent3: Peering stereomicroscopically at the miniature world, she felt like a giant explorer.
meanings.sent4: Through the lens, the world appeared stereomicroscopically enlarged, revealing hidden wonders.
meanings.sent5: The details seen stereomicroscopically were so vivid, they seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: Using a stereomicroscope to view objects in three dimensions.

meanings.sent2: The students marveled at the stereomicroscopically displayed insect specimens in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a stereomicroscopically accurate sculpture that seemed to pop out of the frame.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, she wandered through a stereomicroscopically magnified forest, exploring every leaf.
meanings.sent5: The world seen stereomicroscopically was like stepping into a miniature universe.
